abstract: Idaho Gov C L Otter summons lawmakers back to work over child support bill that had been rejected over concerns it could require the state to enforce rulings made in other countries under Islamic law.
lead_paragraph: Gov. C. L. Otter on Wednesday called lawmakers back to work over a child support bill that was rejected over concerns it could require the state to enforce rulings made in other countries under Islamic law.

headline.main: Idaho: Special Session Is Called to Reconsider Child Support Bill
headline.print_headline: Idaho: Special Session Is Called to Reconsider Child Support Bill

snippet: Gov. C. L. Otter on Wednesday called lawmakers back to work over a child support bill that was rejected over concerns it could require the state to enforce rulings made in other countries under Islamic law.
